rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with elegant floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and a West-facing outlook. Features minimalistic design to welcome visitors.
Luxury living area with industrial aesthetics including exposed beams and polished concrete finishes, complemented by floor-to-ceiling glass walls to enhance the view.
Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and an island counter. Incorporates natural light through strategic placement of windows.
An open dining area integrated into the living space for a seamless flow, benefiting from ample natural lighting.
A quiet library zone designed with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating, oriented in an auspicious direction per Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

openings.description: Large door to welcome visitors, ensuring a positive flow of energy according to local norms.
Floor-to-ceiling glass panel maximizing natural light and enhancing West-facing view in line with Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: A luxury swimming pool integrated into the outdoor design on the plot, ensuring a relaxing ambiance while abiding by local building codes.
